form.label: Zeek SSH (V2.0)
form.description: V2 Additions: Dashboard Now Rides The Zeek_Suite Datamodel

search.query:
| tstats summariesonly=f count from datamodel=Zeek_Suite.SSH by SSH.client, SSH.id_orig_h, SSH.id_resp_h | rename SSH.client AS client, SSH.id_orig_h AS id.orig_h, SSH.id_resp_h AS id.resp_h
| where !like (client, "-") AND !like (client, "%SSH%")
| sort -count | appendpipe [| stats count | where count=0 | eval "client"="No Instances Found"] | rename client AS "Client", id.orig_h AS Source, id.resp_h AS Destination

| tstats summariesonly=f count from datamodel=Zeek_Suite.SSH by SSH.client, SSH.id_orig_h, SSH.id_resp_h, SSH.dest_port, SSH.server | rename SSH.client AS client, SSH.id_orig_h AS id.orig_h, SSH.id_resp_h AS id.resp_h, SSH.dest_port AS port, SSH.server AS server
| where !like (port, "22")
| sort -count | appendpipe [| stats count | where count=0 | eval "client"="No Instances Found"] | rename id.orig_h AS Source, id.resp_h AS Destination, id.resp_p AS Port, server AS Server, client AS Client

| tstats summariesonly=f count from datamodel=Zeek_Suite.SSH by , SSH.id_orig_h, SSH.id_resp_h | rename SSH.id_orig_h AS id.orig_h, SSH.id_resp_h AS id.resp_h
| rex field=id.orig_h "(?<orig_subnet>\d+\.\d+)\.\d+\.\d+" | eval orig_subnet=orig_subnet + ".0.0/16" | rex field=id.resp_h "(?<resp_subnet>\d+\.\d+)\.\d+\.\d+" | eval resp_subnet=resp_subnet + ".0.0/16" | where !like (client, "-") | stats count by orig_subnet, resp_subnet
| sort -count | appendpipe [| stats count | where count=0 | eval "orig_subnet"="No Instances Found"] | rename orig_subnet AS "Source Subnet", resp_subnet AS "Destination Subnet"
